name: Aditya Enterprises
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “Aditya Enterprises” is a successful organization engaged in Manufacturing and Trading a comprehensive range of Automobile Coolant. Under this range, we encompasses Super Coolant, Radiator Coolant, Anti Freezing Coolant, Automobile Anti Freeze Coolant, Automotive Engine Coolant, Anti Rust Coolant, Puroguard Radiator Coolant and Car Radiator Coolant to our valuable customers.

Our Team: Administrative Staff Accounting Personnel Quality Controllers R & D Experts

our Infrastructure: We have developed a sprawling manufacturing unit that is spread across a wide land of area. This manufacturing unit is manned by our team of highly experienced professionals who use high grade raw material in order to manufacture our Automobile Coolant. In addition to this, we offer customized solution to our esteemed clients as per the detailed specifications.

Quality Assurance: Our company is a quality conscious organization, that put constant efforts in order to adhere international standards in our range of Automobile Coolant. We perform strict quality tests on our products through several tests conducted by our quality control staff for its purity and functional efficiency.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client focused company, we continuously work hard in order to serve them with the best quality range of Automobile Coolant. These products are used to lubricate moving parts of the vehicles and mitigates friction that wear and enables smooth running of the vehicle in order to give longer service life. We offer our range of coolants that keeps controls all the deposit forming material.
